segments.text: How careless— the faucet's on and the sink's flooding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is polishing that plate like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle at her feet, and she steps right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy climbs the stool for forbidden snacks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That thing is unstable; he's going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hand in the jar, other on a plate— silly kid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, all eager and impatient.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They think they're so clever, sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage everywhere, what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is mocking this mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout and make them stop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This negligence is infuriating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
